What I Do

Security research grounded in real-world production experience.

Federated Learning Security

Core Research Focus

Attacking federated systems to find weaknesses, then building the defenses. My work spans adversarial robustness, poisoning detection, and cryptographic trust verification.

✓ SignGuard: 94.5% attack detection rate

Production Fraud Detection

Industry Experience

PROVEN RESULTS

Selected Projects

My most impactful work in AI security and fraud detection.

SignGuard: Cryptographic FL Defense

Novel defense combining ECDSA signatures with anomaly detection and reputation scoring to protect federated learning from poisoning attacks.

94.5% attack detection rate with minimal overhead on honest participants
PyTorch Flower ECDSA Reputation Systems
View on GitHub →

FL Security Research

Deep exploration of federated learning vulnerabilities and defenses: Byzantine attacks, secure aggregation, gradient leakage, and privacy attacks.

30+ attack/defense scenarios implemented and benchmarked
PyTorch Flower TensorFlow FastAPI
View on GitHub →

Fraudware Analyzer

Static analysis framework for banking trojan detection using PE file analysis, API call extraction, YARA rules, and ML classification.

88.7% accuracy on 150 banking trojans and 300 benign samples
YARA pefile XGBoost scikit-learn
View on GitHub →
